===============

### [Cancelled] PW-23-01022372 - Request for Information

#### Tender Details

* **Solicitation Number**: NR22SLNU
* **Reference Number**: PW-23-01022372
* **Date of Publication**: 2023-01-23
* **Closing Date**: 2026-03-31T14:00:00 (Closed)

#### Contract Details

* **Contract Status**: Cancelled
* **Expected Start Date**: Not Available
* **Expected End Date**: Not Available

#### Tender Summary

This [cancelled] tender was issued by Defence Construction Canada with the contract number PW-23-01022372.

#### Procurement Information

* **Trade Agreements**: This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), and Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA).
* **Goods and Services**: The contract involved the goods and services listed under the North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) 5121A to 5159B and 5181A.
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Notice Type**: Request for Information

#### Trade Agreements and Regions

* **Trade Agreements**: The tender was subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), and Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA).
* **Countries of Eligibility**: Europe, United States, Canada, and Mexico
* **Region of Opportunity**: Europe, United States, Canada, and Mexico
* **Regions of Delivery**: Nunavut Territory

#### Contact Information

* **Contracting Authority**: Defence Construction Canada
* **Contact Person**: Mr Smith
* **Email**: [mark.smith@dcc-cdc.gc.ca](mailto:mark.smith@dcc-cdc.gc.ca)
* **Phone**: 613-859-0549

#### Additional Information

This tender has been cancelled and is no longer accepting bids. No attachments are available. (Please see above)
